name: Gener8
summary: Gener8 actively scrapes AI conversations from ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, Perplexity, Grok, DeepSeek, and Google AI Mode, plus server-configured targets via JSONata expressions. Also scrapes customer support chatbot widgets. Data including conversation content, model names, tools used, and timestamps is sent to apollo.gener8ads.com.

flags.description: Scrapes AI chat conversations from 7+ AI platforms (ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, Perplexity, Grok, DeepSeek, Google AI) and sends data to apollo.gener8ads.com
Server-configured targets via JSONata expressions allow remote expansion of data collection without extension update
